name: What in the Quaternion!?
description:
Hi! I hope you all like my take on the theme Rotation.

Inspired off the cult classics Space Invaders and Asteroid, I bring you What in the Quaternion!? 

Do any of us actually know how quaternions work? Hell do I know, so I'll let you live my hell, the bullet hell.

P.S. Congratulations to anyone who can pass wave 10!
